title: New Sub board - General Discussion
body:
Hey everyone (especially the old GD group), 

We've recently added a new sub board for you all. The difference in this sub board is that while upvotes and downvotes can still be seen the threads are sorted by which has most recently been commented in (bumped).

Remember to check out the Guidelines for this sub board on the side bar.

Let me know if you have any feedback.
